alternativeNames: Negative Hero and the Demon Lord Army Leader
Negative Hero and Demon King's General
The Negative Hero and the Chief of the Demon Army
ネガティブ勇者と魔王軍幹部
author: Hamachon
description: What happens when the hero arrives at the castle of the general of the demons and knows that they wouldn't be able to defeat it? She cries and is comforted by the general of demons himself!
